title: Kriti OS
desc: A toy UNIX type 32 bit OS from scratch which includes a bootloader, kernel with drivers like video & sound and some basic functionality.

title: Konnect
desc: A simple Social Media application built using the MEVN stack along with Tailwind CSS. Allows users of VIT to interact with each other by posting posts, upvoting, downvoting and commenting.

title: Facemask Detection (Pytorch)
desc: Built after completing my Deep Learning Specialization, this project aims to detect Facemask using cameras and microcontrollers. Built using Pytorch along with MobileNetv2 architecture and transfer learning.

title: Insta DM Bot
desc: A dead simple Instagram Bot with GUI that can be used to DM a list of users and can be used for Social Media Marketing. Built using Python, Selenium and Eel.

title: Ebank-Dummy
desc: A dummy Ebank with Authentication, fake transactions and a downloadable passbook. Built using HTML, CSS, PHP and MySQL, this project got me into Web Developement.

title: TrafficGen
desc: My first buidl, a reasonably modest Python script that sends HTTP requests over the Tor proxy to generate fake traffic for your website.
